how does being $16600 in debt feel?

amazing

kinda funny- today is the first day in about 3 months where i have had free time where i have very few tasks weighing on my shoulders. i got 3 big things done today- i got the proces for selling my broken car in motion, to be sold wednesday, i did the final walkthrough for our old apartment, so i never have to go back there, and i put all the bills in my name for our new place, so that is off my chest. also, we streightened out all the money matters in m house, and payment got started. so right now, the only thing weighing on my mind is school. and i only orked an hour today. 

but i feel like shit. i have this pit in my stomach like i havnt accomplished anything or that there isnt anything for me to be doing. i am feeling very unaccomplished when i should feel very proud that i got all this shit done. but i dont. an now im sitting here feeling werid on livejournal

i hope nicole knows how much we think she is cool. cause its true. we think she is cool. 

love jon

you know, i kinda want to be sir walter raleigh. no real reason, but id have a southern capital named after me and id be a knight in some country, most likely great brittain

it always seems like people either want to be the same person somewhere else or a different person in the same place.

but you cannot be a different person in a different place as there will be no catalyst for change, but when you stay at the same place, you hate who you are.

a troubling problem.

why are some people so disgusted with who they are? cant you be happy being you? is there some person that you dont see in the mirror that you thought was there? 

then fucking go find it and stop making me hate myself for you

there is this horrible feeling in my stomach. its like awkward, but 10000 times worse. why is it there?

there is no reason.

please note that the inflection in my voice is one that is matter of fact. sorta with indignation at the fact that i feel like this. i just saw man of the year, should be called awkward 3 hours of the year, with jenna and her friend who is friends with kari. and i saw her, and that was awkward 3 hours of my life. and i worked today with this kid named leonard. for about 3 hours i worked. he is as awkward as his name sounds. 

so ive had 9 total hours of awkwardness packed into one night

and im indignanat at this feeling. 

the only reason im putting this here is because its such a stupid time to be feeling this way. if i was actually sad, or upset, i would talk to someone, but because its like i jammed a spoon up my ass, im confused. i feel like lewis black, who was in the movie, and was funny...

dude, i just realized. that awkard feeling, is me being really really hungry

i havnt eaten since 2 today. and its 1. not like im starvin marvin, but maybe 10000 times awkward is really just 11 hours of no food. wow. now i feel better

ha

this just happened. 

lasst week, my work had me convinced that my name was JonathOn, not JonathAn, like it actually is. how did they do that? my paycheck. thus far, an employer has yet to get all of my information correct. bennigans thought i was at APT# 151 and my middle name was R. sdsu bookstore thought my apt# was 111, and now jonathOn. who the fuck wants to be called jonathOOOOOOOn like a fucking bird call or something.

fuck am i hungry. i work in 8 hours. i want 8 hours of sleep. fuck you hunger. fuck you awkwrd movie and experience. fucking chuck norris.

use some restraint. i dont use my sexual frustration (which i will get into in a minute) to be an ass to you. please not, sexual frustration is a joke and you will get it by the end of this. 

maybe if you didnt treat me like shit, i wouldnt be uneasy talking to you. get a boyfriend to beat the shit out of. you dont hurt eric. you dont hurt derek. you dont hurt jeff.

stop being so shallow, impulive, and immature. if you act like a bitch, expect someone to tell you about it.

Dear Diary,

My life is like a dark chasm of armpit hair.

I can smell the potent smell of chrysanthimums as i stab stabity rip stab my arms

I feel as though the walls are suffocating me like thousands of midget arms pulling me in a small room

I dont think i can stand another day of unununununderstanding from my peers

Oh, the disgruntledness of it all.

It hurts to defacate

It hurts to aspirate

It hurts to live

I find myself strangely attracted to my roomates, especially the one with the young girlfriend

Im not gay though

I want to wear girl pants

Right now

Oh, the agony that is my 

Topher Grace is going to be venom in spiderman 3

And it agonizes my soul

My whole life is ruined

Thank you, Diary, for listening to me

You are my only friend

If you request it:

1. I'll respond with something random about you.
2. I'll tell you what song/movie reminds me of you.
3. I'll tell you what color I associate with you.
4. I'll say something that only makes sense to you and me.
5. I'll tell you my first/clearest memory of you.
6. I'll tell you what animal you remind me of.
7. I'll ask you something that I've always wondered about you.
8. If I do this for you, you must post this on your journal.

Its kinda been one of those days.

1. I find out that the car i am supposed to get will only be available (maybe) on the day im supposed to go to SD and help derek unload my stuff. I will have to go down later than he is and unload what i can when i get there.

2. I find that one of my best friends, in an absence from them, has changed into something i feared they could always become: completely shallow and forgetful of what is important, neither caring for her hometown nor axxepting that there are any people in there that mean anything to her. also, it becomes clear that she has always been actually shallow, rather than what i concieved as ignorance or innocence.

3. It becomes clear that one of my friends is only staying with their other for rent money, with a simple comment like "at least you have someone you like to talk to." i realize this, but know that there is nothing i can do, as this information is probably already suspected by the second party.
         on a second note to this statement, couples that break up after a long time at age 18 or 19 should remain broken up, as the possibility that the reasons for breaking up were changed arew slim to none.

4. Everytime a guy finds a girl, it becomes a shock for his friends that someone else will be taking up some of their time with. this isnt a selfish realization, as we all understand, but it is still obvious when it happens that a change has happened.

5. I got into a debate about a stupid, insignificant observation in a movie. When sise "A" convinces me of his validity, i find that the debators on side "B" will relentlessly bash side "A" if he does not have any support, and i try ruthlessly to convince side "B" in to our opinion, not so much for my own satisfaction, but for the protection of my friend. after some time, it is agreed that side "A" was correct, but only after side "B" tried to discredit our reasoning. its now easy to see that if you cant baet em, try to find a flaw in their reasoning, or give them an alternative reason for why they are correct.
         on a second note to this statement, after successfully prooving my point, i felt no vindication or fullfillment over winning and protecting my friend, only childish and ignorant for arguing in the first place, further making me see that i can not stand being on only one side of an argument, meaning i would be a terrible debater.

6. Dont get pissed when i dont have something fun on the tip of my mind to do. it has never been my job to entertain with group activities.

7. So melanie ellefson has had sex before some of us. to the two people that cant have sex because of religion, it was a big deal. to me, i could care less. if you dont want to be a virgin, dont be religious. other than that, its not a big deal.

8. I \kinda realize that when i get drunk, i say what i really feel. maybe thats why i get drunk.

9. Basically i dont fucking care about most people anymore. as the days creep closer, i am more and more anxious to go back where i can read all of this when i choose to, not deal with it right in my fucking face. 

To those of you who may get offended by all this, dont. because in times of bad days, ive read your BS directed at others or me and not taken it seriously.

so i think i need to get a 76% on my final to get a 70% in the class

**PROOF**

given: total points as of May 9 = 400, total of points jon has as of may 9 = 250, final test will be 40 % of final grade.

Points available on test = 40/100 = x/(400+x)
                           = 16000+40x = 100x
                           = 16000 = 60x
                           = 266.67

Total points in class after final = 666.67 (Ironically, damn stanic italian calc teacher, i knew he was evil)

Points required for 70% = 666.67*.70
                        = 466.69

Points i need to earn for 70% = 466.67-250
                              = 216.67

Percent i need on final to get 216.67 class points = 216.67/266
                                                   = 81.4%

Added fact = one test will be given 15 points leway, so i waill be given 15 more points, thus, 265 is the total points before final. 216-15 = 201, 201/266 = 76%

this whole calculatio is dependant on the fact dependant variable that i havnt missed more than 6 days of class, thus making the test that i missed doubled with the final. if total missed days > 6, Jon = fucked. if total missed days < 6, jon = maybe not fucked. if total missed days = 6, jon doenst know what happens and hopes. Jon thinks that total missed days < 6, but is not sure

if you actually read this whole thing, im proud (lauren, im not proud of you because you shiuld already be able to do all this, but maybe just a little proud)


Jon the rocket scientist

Your #1 Match: INFP

The Idealist You are creative with a great imagination, living in your own inner world. Open minded and accepting, you strive for harmony in your important relationships. It takes a long time for people to get to know you. You are hesitant to let people get close. But once you care for someone, you do everything you can to help them grow and develop. You would make an excellent writer, psychologist, or artist.

Your #2 Match: INFJ

The Protector You live your life with integrity, originality, vision, and creativity. Independent and stubborn, you rarely stray from your vision - no matter what it is. You are an excellent listener, with almost infinite patience. You have complex, deep feelings, and you take great care to express them. You would make a great photographer, alternative medicine guru, or teacher.

Your #3 Match: INTP

The Thinker You are analytical and logical - and on a quest to learn everything you can. Smart and complex, you always love a new intellectual challenge. Your biggest pet peeve is people who slow you down with trivial chit chat. A quiet maverick, you tend to ignore rules and authority whenever you feel like it. You would make an excellent mathematician, programmer, or professor.
What's Your Personality Type?
